'''''Over Sandstorms and Mirages (I)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to unlock all [[Teleport Waypoint]]s in the following areas in [[Sumeru]]: [[Hypostyle Desert]], [[Land of Upper Setekh]], and [[Land of Lower Setekh]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Some of the Teleport Waypoints can only be accessed upon progressing through the {{Quest|Golden Slumber}}, the {{Quest|Old Notes and New Friends}}, and the {{Quest|Afratu's Dilemma}}.
